name: Lime Productions
tag_list: digital, art, transfer, old, photo, film, slides, audio, cassettes, records, memories
overview:
We are a 21st century company solely devoted to beautifying important moments in people’s lives with cutting-edge technology and superb artistry. We create “Digital Art.” We enable people to preserve, watch, and share their precious memories. We go beyond technology. We humanize it.

_ Bring us your faded photos, slides, vanishing videos, audio cassettes, records, reels of film, or images of any momentous moment.

_ An expert graphic designer will work with you personally to craft your custom DVD digital motion picture with innovative technology and expertise.

_ We restore, optimize, and transfer photos, slides, film, video, audio cassettes, records, and digital media into a unique, high-quality DVD digital motion picture.

_ Share these special moments to watch on your TV, computer, iPod, cell phone, any other handheld, or projected on a big screen.

_ Please visit us at www.limepros.com

_ We are unique and highly service oriented.

_ We provide state-of-the-art artistry.
